name: rounding
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of putting a number up or down to the nearest whole number or the nearest hundred, thousand, etc.

Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of reducing or increasing an amount to the nearest 1, 10, 100, etc.: Percentages may not total 100 because of rounding.
